text: Cohay is an unincorporated community in Smith County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== The community derives its name from alteration of the last two syllables of nearby Oakohay Creek. A post office called Cohay was established in 1915, and remained in operation until 1937. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Smith County, Mississippi
title: Cohay, Mississippi
